title: following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021)
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) (No. 2) Order 2022.
text_norm: 1 order may cited maritime area planning act 2021 (commencement certain provisions) (no 2) order 2022

title: following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021)
heading: 2. The 31st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 31st day of July 2022 is appointed as the day on which the 

following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021) 
shall come into operation: 

(a) Part 1, other than sections 6 and 12, 

(b) Chapter 4 of Part 9, and 

(c) Schedules 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 9. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

28 July, 2022. 

DARRAGH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [394] 3
text_norm: 2 31st day july 2022 appointed day following provision maritime area planning act 2021 (no 50 2021) shall come operation (a) part 1 section 6 12 (b) chapter 4 part 9 (c) schedule 2 3 4 5 6 9 given official seal 28 july 2022 darragh brien minister housing local government heritage notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 2nd august 2022 394 3

title: following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021)
heading: (This note is not part of the legal instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the legal instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

This Order appoints 31 July 2022 as the date on which 

• 

• 

• 

Part 1 (other than sections 6 and 12), 

Chapter 4 of Part 9, and 

Schedules 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 9 

of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 2021) comes into 
operation. 

Chapter 4 amends provisions of the Electricity Regulation Act 1999 to 
transmission system operator of certain 
facilitate ownership by 
transmission system assets and 
its commencement enables necessary 
amendments to the European Communities (Internal Market in Electricity) 
Regulations 2000 (S.I. No. 445 of 2000). 

the 

The Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (Commencement of Certain Provisions) 
Order 2022 (S.I. No. 112/2022) appointed 10 March 2022 as the day on which 
the following provisions of the Maritime Area Planning Act 2021 (No. 50 of 
2021) came into operation: 

(a) section 72; 

(b) Part 4 (other than Chapter 12); and 

(c) Part 6. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [394]
